title: engcryptotoken
author: engcryptotoken
content: ENERGY POLY COIN - The Energy Web Decentralized Operating System Open-Source Technology.The Energy Token (ENG) is a cryptocurrency belonging to the Energy Web Foundation (ENG). The Energy Web Foundation is an organization dedicated to building open-source operating systems for energy grids that can help in powering a zero-carbon economy.Further, the Energy Web Foundation website states that to expedite this energy transition process for decarbonization, EWF focuses on leveraging blockchain and other digital technology. This process has allowed the organization to develop the Energy Web Decentralized Operating System (EW-DOS), open-source software that includes its Energy Web Chain.Poly Network is a global cross-chain protocol for implementing blockchain interoperability and building Web3.0 infrastructure. Polymath makes smart digital investments easy — all in one platform. One institutional-grade platform to digitize real world assets represented as security.Benefits of Using Our Solution.ENG takes security very seriously and the migrator code has been removed and a 30-hour timelock is in place. To support enterprise-grade solutions in these domains, we are transitioning our technology approach from a blockchain-only architecture to the Energy Web Decentralized Operating System (EW-DOS), a stack of open-source software and standards that includes the Energy Web Chain.Energy Solution With Crypto Currency.Using ENG's expertise and knowledge of environmentally friendly technology we are developing low cost, environmentally responsible energy solutions for powering large scale blockchain mining operations. ENG Industries is strategically focused on cryptocurrency mining with the introduction of a proprietary “Green Energy Mining” System. Powered with renewable & surplus energy sources such as wind, solar, natural gas, wind, and geothermal that utilize battery storage technology.ENERGY POLY COIN Website and Social Media Links. Website | Instagram | Twitter | Reddit | Facebook | Telegram | Energy Poly Coin Smart Contract

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: You're a child project of this foundation, correct? Can you please help and assure me by pointing out to a page on their site or an article that acknowledge this correlation? I've tried to navigate through Energy Web's site and couldn't find any mention about you. Although somehow you've been on the market quite a while, so I also failed to understand why posting an ANN just now
